main.name: Thanh Tran
main.description: creating awesome and effective websites for companies of all sizes around the hooman world.
main.bio: I am going to tell you more about me. Actually, I'm just a lone catto in a hooman community who is wandering around the world, developing websites to make money to fix everything i ruined like the sofa in the living room, a laptop of my friend, ect... And buy catfoods and catnips.

address.street: 66/xx Tran Van Quang, Ward 10, Tan Binh District

education.degree: Finished High school (12/12) with Above Average degree.
education.description: Just a normal catto, went to school like everyone else in this world, nothing much to tell. Nothing special, no girlfriends, no kids, lived in a peaceful life with no regrets.

Still that normal catto, but he can do the website developing now, he's still waiting for a job to fix things in the past. Nothing special, no girlfriends until now, no kids of course, living in a peaceful life with a lot of regrets but it's fine.

work.title: Fresher Fullstack Developer
work.description: Catto tried to find a job to do but he didn't know anything, so he tried to learn everything on the internet but it made no sense, he was a noob after all. In the last 2 years in the University, a light came through his head like a starfall. He learnt Node.js and React and worked so hard with them. He created a lot of projects with their helps.

work.company: X Company - X is a mystery
work.title: Fresher Fullstack Developer
work.description: After 3 (or 4) years, Catto has to go to work. He can work with Node.js and React now. Give him a chance to improve himself as a fullstack developer. Well, why not, give him a try.
